title: MASTER BD AVAILABLE in 3BD/2.5 BA APT - Next to Fulton Market
posting_body: ROOM AVAILABLE (Price does not include utilities)
Master Bedroom - $1,400 - This amazing large, spacious bedroom which is practically a studio is located steps from Fulton Market!
The master includes a giant walk-in closet layout and an attached en-suite master bathroom.
The bathroom features a large jacuzzi tub, double sink, plenty of cabinet storage space, and a large standing shower on the opposite end - who wouldn't want this?
In addition, the bedroom has a sizable ceiling fan, large easy-to-open windows for fresh air.
SITUATION
Seeking an individual to sign with me for SEPTEMBER 1st 2022 - JULY 30, 2023 for this 3 BD/2.5 BA Flat.
New roommate would occupy the Master Bedroom.
I am renting out the first and second bedrooms in this unit for myself.
I have all furniture/entertainment as well as kitchen supplies, cleaning, etc. for the unit.
You would only need to worry about your bedroom.
I am open to scheduled phone calls followed by a scheduled tour.
Video tours can be done as well.
This amazing unit is steps from Fulton Market/West Loop!
The room does not come furnished.
Utilities are not included in rent, but average out $60-$100/MONTH depending on the season.
LOOKING FOR
I am in search of 1 new roommate M/F in their late 20's/early 30's to fill the large, master bedroom, in this 3 BD/2.5 BA lease.
Seeking an individual who is easy-going, friendly, considerate/respectful, and a young professional.
Someone who can clean up after themselves (I do understand sometimes we can get busy).
Most importantly, communicates well and is financially stable to pay bills and rent on time!
ABOUT MYSELF
- Fem.
(I occupy first and second bedroom)
I am 30 y/o
- I am a full-time young professional, working in commercial real estate in River North
- Typically enjoy weekdays in and weekends over dinner or going out in the city with friends
- Easy going, friendly, enjoy a good time with good company
- Would like to keep community spaces neat and tidy
MORE ABOUT THIS BEAUTIFUL FLAT
- Steps from booming Fulton Market & Chicago's prestigious Restaurant Row on Randolph, including renowned headquarters such as Google, McDonald's, and GlassDoor.
Prestigious Celebrity Chef Restaurants by Rick Bayless (Cruz Blanca & Lena Brava), Stephanie Izard (Girl & the Goat, and more).
Au Cheval, Aba, Bar Siena, The Publican, Swift & Sons, Momotaro, BLVD, and many more!
- Easy 3-5 Minute Access to the I-90, I-290 Expressways
- Walking Distance to Rush Medical District.
- 5 Minute Walk to the Pink and Green Lines (Ashland) and 1 Block Away from Union Park (Pitchfork Festival and Spring Awakening!)
- 3 Minute Walk to the United Center for Blackhawks, Bulls, and concertgoers (United Center is visible from the apartment)
- Wood Floors, Fireplace, and Stainless-Steel Appliances
-Kitchen has granite countertops with a large island and 2 new barstools
-New Dishwasher and the kitchen sink has a garbage disposal
- In-Unit Washer/Dryer with additional storage
- Spacious Back Balcony with large table and chairs as well as evening lighting for ambiance
- Permit Street Parking for Residents and Guest Passes for United Center & Union Park events as well!
